docker-test-arm.command: docker buildx build -f apps/mailhog/Dockerfile --load --platform linux/arm64 --cache-to type=gha,mode=max --cache-from type=gha --tag philiplehmann/mailhog:test-arm .

docker-test-amd.command: docker buildx build -f apps/mailhog/Dockerfile --load --platform linux/amd64 --cache-to type=gha,mode=max --cache-from type=gha --tag philiplehmann/mailhog:test-amd .
